name: Jason Morris
text: Good customer service very helpful

name: GARY Busby
text: Great place

name: Kimmie Dee
text:
Overall pleasant experience with this company!

The ladies in dispatch were friendly, professional, and very easy to talk to.Text messages and emails were sent out, keeping me informed about my job.

That said... My job was scheduled, but then cancelled last minute, on two different occasions. Both times were rescheduled for the following day - Which was not too bad.

On the day that my crew arrived, I was a little surprised that it turned out to be a 'one-man crew'; however, Fabio had a very impressive work ethic. He was a hard worker; knowledgeable & very committed to his line of work. He was also very neat, and cleaned up the debris, as he worked. I was amazed at how quickly & efficiently he completed the job, on his own!

Overall, I am very pleased with the job that was performed, and I absolutely love, love my new Home Depot floors!

I would recommend this business.

name: Maya Spivey
text: I had two installations scheduled. They called the day of installation and rescheduled on two separate occasions. Really unprofessional. Installation when they came out and did the carpet was great.

name: Dianna Moore
text: Excellent experience.   Very grateful Danny and his crew were assigned to install our new flooring.  Timely, courteous, informative and picked up after each area of floor was installed.  Didn't wait until job was done.  I couldn't have been more satisfied! Danny even called the day after job was complete to make sure everything was ok, nothing overlooked and everything was left to my satisfaction.  I would recommend Danny and his crew all day long!  I will also request them if I have any more project come up.

resp.text: Thank you, Dianna, for sharing your experience.  Enjoy! :)

name: Brenda Davidson
text:
Every aspect of our carpet installation was handled professionally from
initial contact to follow-up to installation.  The technicians were punctual and installed the carpet quickly and expertly.  We are very pleased.  We would definitely use them again.

resp.text: Thank you, Brenda, for sharing your experience.  Enjoy your beautiful new carpet! :)

name: Donna Simmons
text: I left a more detailed review on Yelp. It was to lengthy for Google. This company is unprofessional.  Needs to improve on their scheduling.  Come up with off the wall excuses for everything.  After months trying to get a carpet install finished (all left was install of a 3 ft transition piece)I gave up and called a local installer that put down my kitchen floor. Romanoff was supposed to along with the carpet. But I didn't trust them in my house after the carpet installation. Hire local if you can. This company is a joke. They were sent by Home Depot.

name: Kathy Scruggs
text: They arrived on time, worked really fast and consulted us frequently along the way to make sure to address any questions or concerns they had. I highly recommend Danny and his team. They were excellent.

resp.text: Thank you, Kathy, for sharing your experience.  Enjoy :)

name: Will S
text: I’ll say the actual carpet installers were great and thorough. But the company canceled on me twice last minute and I had to keep taking off work. They said they would send me home depot gift cards each time they canceled - never happened.

name: Thomas Michael
text: On time,worked til job was done and I was satisfied

resp.text: Thank you, Thomas, for sharing your experience.  Enjoy! :)

name: Jeff Aycock
text: Was supposed to have carpet installed in a condo in Homewood yesterday (9/16) - I live in Nashville. We had hidden a key for entry. Called 4 times and left messages - never heard back from anyone - so........... not sure if carpet was installed or not. How do you run a business without calling your customer back?

name: Mike Compton
text:
After receiving a text at 8:05 verifying that the installer would be there between 11 and 2, I received a text rescheduling for the following Monday.  After calling, I learned installer called in and said he would not be at work.  No one in your office bothered to let me know.
You don't deserve a zero.  I cancelled the whole job.

name: Rachel Olis
text: Romanoff did a great job! They communicated with us throughout the entire process and were punctual and professional. They did a great job - the only reason I am giving 4 stars over 5 is because our baseboards were scratched in the process of installation and we will need to touch them up. Otherwise we were very pleased!

name: Terry Bell
text: They installed our new flooring and we are very pleased with the results.  The guys were friendly and professional.  They cleaned up after finishing the job.  We couldn't have asked for more.

resp.text: Thank you, Terry, for sharing your experience.  Enjoy your new flooring :)

name: ricky jones
text: Day one of installation they were supposed to be there between 8 & 11 at 11:30 they texted and said my time had changed from 12 to 3, they didn’t show at all and didn’t even have the courtesy to call. They wouldn’t answer the phone, I left several messages which they never returned. That night they sent a text saying they would be there in the morning. We had to sleep on the floor since we cleaned everything out of the bedroom except the big furniture. He arrived a little after 9 with no help to move the furniture, I had to help him. It’s a good thing Adolfo did a good job or they would have gotten zero stars

name: Courtney Adams
text: Horrible customer service. Three times they were supposed to show up and didn’t. Just having them inspect my flooring from a previous flooring install they did that I’ve had nothing but problems out of. No way would I ever use them on my own but I’ve bought flooring through Home Depot and this is who they use. I will be sure to never recommend your company and tell everyone to not use them.

name: Callie James
text: They did a good job installing my carpet.

resp.text: Thank you, Callie, for sharing your experience.

text: I would love to give Ryan a higher rate, but he has not responded to our phone call messages nor his website queries.

name: Melanie Williams
text: I had a positive experience prior so hired Kevin again. I tried to reach him to make things right and could not reach him via phone or text. My flooring was cut incorrectly. I have numerous spots where you can see the slab. Toilets were not correctly re-installed. House was left a total mess. Floors were filthy, grout and sand and debris left in my sinks and tubs. Trim was not replaced where it belonged. Hole was made in my bedroom wall, was repaired, not great. I felt I was taken advantage of regarding charges to remove subfloor. I questioned the high rate and was told it was because it could take days, it took hours yet I wasn’t offered any relief.

name: Alex
text: Kevin is prompt and very professional. He arrived on time and notified me in advance when he would be here and what he would be doing. He tore out my old plastic master shower and tiled in a beautiful new one for me. The only negative is my water bill is going to go up because I love my shower now.10/10 highly recommended for tile in shower work.

name: Meredith Zywno
text: Kevin and his team recently replaced some laminate flooring in two rooms of our house with hardwoods. Kevin arrived on time and got the job done well within the expected timeline. He and his team were extremely courteous and professional, and his office manager was very easy to work with. We are very happy with how our floors turned out and will definitely be calling WCR in the future.

I am having to hire someone else to correct his errors with the wood floors installed.

text: Paul was great to work with! Really knows his stuff. The instal only took a little over an hour and they were super friendly and efficient! We are so happy with our new carpet. Highly recommend!

name: Mary Dutta
text: Ww had an excellent experience with this company. Paul was very responsive and clear up front about the process. Buck and his crew were prompt, pleasant, and did a beautiful job. The price was reasonable and the results outstanding. Highly recommend.

name: Lora Gaxiola
text: Paul was responsive and easy to work with. He presented several options to fit our budget. The work was done promptly, neatly, and efficiently and we're so happy with the results!

name: Sarah LeCroy
text: So happy with my floors. I chose to go with a darker grey flooring that is scratch proof and waterproof. I have a black lab, so these floors will be so much better than the dingy carpet I had. Paul was very prompt and even came to my condo to show me samples. I never even had to go in the store, everyone came to me! I called Homewood carpet and flooring, and the same afternoon I ordered my floors. Buk and his helpers were on time and did a fantastic job. They cleaned up very well after laying the floors and were respectful of my furniture and belongings. I live in a 750~ sq ft. Condo, approximately 3/4 of the condo flooring was being redone, and took 10 hours from start to finish. I would highly recommend Homewood Carpet and Flooring. You can’t beat the quality of floors, the timeliness and the accountability they give you for their price. Thank you!

name: Elizabeth Adams
text: Very responsive and helpful! Helped us out in a pinch when our first carpet installer backed out just a few weeks before the project date. Directed me to a carpet that was in stock (and what I wanted) so that the project could move forward on the timeline our business needed. At the install, they discovered an unexpected floor issue which required us to make a last minute change and he handled that and found an available carpet for us. Went above and beyond to make sure our timeline was met! Super nice guys did the install. Great attitudes and a pleasure to work with.

name: Naomi Smitherman
text:
I was pleased with the whole process.  I needed carpet stretched.  I got a fair quote for the work and it was completed sooner than expected.
The two men who stretched the carpet were prompt, courteous, quick workers and they did a great job.  My floors look so much better.

name: Melanie Clark
text: Foo did an amazing job with helping me pick out quality flooring for two basement rooms. He gave a great price and was quick with getting me scheduled. The communication was great through the whole process. He was easy to work with. His team was efficient and very pleasant to deal with. I would definitely recommend!

name: Cody Hirsberg
text: We decided to use Homewood Carpet & Flooring based on the referral of a trusted builder. Tyler was excellent to work with regarding sales and selection. He came by the house for measurements and then met us at the showroom to review his recommendations and to make a flooring selection. Foo then organized the install and, because we were in a bind with guests arriving in a few days, was able to install the carpet a day sooner than expected.  Overall, Homewood Carpet and Flooring exceeded expectations which is why they earned this 5-star review.

name: Ann Langley
text: Paul was extremely helpful and responsive throughout our decision making and installation process.   The installation crew was courteous and very hardworking.  Everything was cleaned up and put back in place when they finished.  I have already referred this company to several friends!

name: Alexandra Baugh
text: Got carpet replaced in 3 rooms. Very fast and good quality work! Would definitely use again and recommend. Fair pricing and kind staff.

name: Wendy Morell
text: I’ve had three jobs done in the last month: carpeting stairs, refinishing original hardwood floors, and laying vinyl flooring. All three looked amazing when finished. The people who completed the work were kind and knowledgeable. I would highly HIGHLY recommend to anyone for any job, and if I have any flooring needs in the future, I will definitely be going back to Foo!

name: Austin Wilson
text: Amazing customer service! Fair pricing, they did a great job, and in a timely manner. Will use again!

name: Shannon George
text: I called on Saturday and was told someone would come out Monday to look at our floors. No one showed up, no one called to cancel, no one called to reschedule.

name: Erika Olds
text: Paul was very nice an easy to work with excellent customer service.This company has great pricing and did an excellent job on my mom's floors. They went above and beyond to make sure she was satisfied I would recommend them to anyone.

name: Mandy Willig
text: Paul and his team replaced our carpet with beautiful engineered hardwood flooring. They provided amazing service throughout the process, from home consultation through the final walk through. We will not hesitate to recommend them to our friends and family!

name: Mark Grissom
text: We had an urgent need entering into a new home. Foo and crew responded same day, made selections easy, had it installed before we could get through the quoting process of big box. The installers were friendly, efficient, and the work was superb with exactly the product we wanted. What else can I say! Oh, above all else wife loves the new carpet and quality work.

name: carol harris
text: From the moment I walked in the door I was completely impressed with Homewood Carpet & Flooring. Not only was Paul knowledgeable about the flooring, he was genuinely interested in my specific needs for flooring. He was completely helpful  in the product selection that would best suit my needs. He stayed in communication with me throughout the entire process. His install team was  right on time and did a beautiful job. The guys were extremely thorough. I was really impressed with their attention to detail. They finished my (whole house) flooring job on time and left my home clean and in order. I have no reservations at all in recommending the guys at Homewood Carpet & Flooring to my friends and family.

name: 9 Bachelors
text: Great job all the way. Excellent service, accurate quotes, very professional, polite and thorough installation team.

name: Greg Yemm
text: Quality, prices, and service were all 5 stars. The owner was very responsive any time I had questions too. Definitely would recommend.

name: Kelly Arrington
text: Enthusiastic crew who did a fantastic job on matching the rest of my floors and amazing job on my stairwell. The were timely, efficient and did a high quality job!

name: Brian Murphy
text: You are in good hands with Paul and his team.  First class service and a job well done.  I would recommend this company to anyone looking for flooring work.  Paul’s team sanded and re-stained my floors.  The work was of the highest quality.  Will definitely work with them again in the future.

name: Corie Clark
text: Foo was easy to work with and very responsive. The carpet and vinyl plank in out basement looks great.

name: Bryan Stack
text:
I highly recommend them. Paul helped me select the flooring to replace my carpet. He was very prompt in providing an estimate and getting the job started.
The installers did an excellent job removing the carpeting and installing my vinyl floors. My condo looks 100% better. I will choose them again when I sell my condo and purchase another home.

name: Britney Henry
text: Paul and his staff did a wonderful job with our flooring project! We had our red oak floors refinished and also had our stairs repaired. They took our very outdated and yellowed flooring and transformed it into a beautiful brown/gray color that is exactly what we had envisioned. They even mixed two of the stains to get the exact color we described. One room had several areas of stains that was so bad I wasn’t sure they would ever look normal, but they were able to make the stains completely disappear. They also replaced a broken part of one step and repaired the stair treads so that they no longer squeak! We are completely satisfied with the job that Homewood Carpet and Flooring did for us and we appreciate their professionalism and thoroughness.

name: felicity79
text: I was unsure of what flooring I wanted, Paul was very helpful on helping me decide to refinish my hardwoods or to choose a new floor. He came to my house to show me color swatches and was willing to come back a second time when I thought I had changed my mind. I ended up going to his store and we picked out a beautiful floor that I am so proud of. Installation only took maybe 4 hours for my 900 ft. square floor. I would choose them again for my flooring needs. Will be redoing my kitchen floor soon, and definitely plan on calling Homewood Carpet and Flooring.

name: Susan Copeland
text: I have used Homewood carpet and flooring three separate times now for my home renovations and each time they exceed my expectations. Both Foo and Paul are really lovely to work with and provide clear communication so that I always knew exactly what was going to occur. And with a German Shepard puppy and 3 teenage boys, they have always guided me on the best flooring and carpet that would keep up with our chaotic and busy household :)!

name: Tracy Thomas
text: Paul and the guys at Homewood carpet and flooring did a wonderful job removing and installing new carpet in our upstairs! I even had to reschedule them and they fit me in on a Saturday at a moments notice! Everyone I worked with was professional and timely.

name: Kristina Martin
text: So compassionate and helpful. We had a time crunch and extenuating circumstances and they worked within those and did the job well.

name: Shelley
text: I cannot say enough great things about Cory and his installation crew. The entire process, from start to finish, was amazing. Everything was thoroughly explained, I was kept up to date, and there were no surprise fees. The installation team far exceeded my expectations. They were very friendly, efficient and highly skilled. They cleaned up everything before they left and made sure I was happy with everything. I had put my kitchen floor project off for a long time because I can't stand having strangers working in my home as it is so stressful. This company put me at ease and I am so grateful I gave them a chance. My new floor is beautiful! If you are hesitant about having strangers in your house and need a great job at a very fair price, call Cory!

text: I had flooring installed from this company in 2015. After two years of fighting to get these things fixed, it was finally somewhat decent. But the gaps between the flooring became an issue and soon started to separate and pull up. They came out and looked at the flooring in 2018 and agreed to lay new flooring for me, I picked out my new flooring bc the design I had previously ordered was no longer available. Apparently the new floor I picked was back ordered so it took months to come in, and once it did I was not notified, so I had to call and call to get my installation set up. Needless to say, there were more issues and as of right now, I still do not have the transition from my kitchen into my dining room bc the installer said that someone else would be handling that and when I called that person they laughed and said that was incorrect and now noone will answer my calls.

name: Theodore Chandler
text:
Fails to deliver. Possibility of being ghosted.

TLDR:
Request patch on back porch to prevent further floor joist damage
Company patches hole but it fails to seal against water leaks
Request company come back to fix patch
Company fails to deliver. Instead stops all contact with customer.

I accepted a proposal to repair a leak on my back porch and fix a floor joist which had been rotting due to the leak.
Work took place on February 20th while I was out of town. The floor joist was successfully repaired. Unfortunately when I got back and poured some water over the patch I found that it still allowed water onto the support.
I contacted the business owner (Devin Lanier) on February 25 by text message and by email on February 27th.
The business owner replied via email the next day stating "So sorry about that. Let me look at our schedule and I will get someone back out there to check it out ASAP".
The company scheduled an appointment for Sunday March 3rd to look at the leak. A storm came through the area on the day they were scheduled and I understand it would not have been possible for them to come out. Unfortunately no cancellation notice was communicated to me.
I reached back out by email on March 4th to ask again for someone to check on the leak and I was told "Yes a few of my guys were caught up up with the weather. Let me look at our schedule this week and try to get someone to cut loose and head over there. I’ll let you know. "

Since the email on the March 4th I have not received any contact from the company. I have tried many avenues of contact without success.
Including emails on March 9th, March 14th, March 18th and March 28th.
Phone calls to both the main number requesting call backs and the estimator number. None of which have been returned

name: kyle
text:
If you support truckers (the back bone of America, the ones that bring you food and all the essentials you need) do not shop here. They will boot you and say you owe them 500 bucks to remove it. They say they have signs up to warn truckers to not park or turn around in their lot but the sign is 100 feet off the road and against the building, you can't see that till you are already in the lot. The other 4 signs they have are 1"×2" signs you can't read till you are right on top of them and from what I could see those only said no parking. If you really wanted to till truckers not to use your lot you should put your sign front and center next to the roadway where people can see it.

They clearly can't make enough money on flooring so they have to prey on truck driver to make their mortgage. This place is a cash grab, and a place of extortion.

resp.text: Again sir I have had nothing but problems from disrespectful truckers since I opened my business. If you can’t read a 4 foot by 8 foot sign asking you to not park or turn around there then maybe you are in the wrong line of work. Maybe an optometrist visit is in your future.

name: Courtney Coaker
text:
Much like others, we have had a horrible experience. We purchased a new home, and Gene's Flooring did the vinyl plank as well as the tile installation. Atrocious for both!!  Stepped on a piece of flooring in the dining room and it slid apart right under my foot. It is peeling and scratching as if it were an 20 year old floor not 8 months (that is the current age...has been doing this since move in 8 mos ago). The grouting of almost all tile work looks like a kindergartener did it, and I have no words for the shower insets.

We had a representative come to our home with the builder to go over the issues. 5 weeks later and three follow ups from us, and I cannot get any work moving forward let alone a response other than we are working on it. Worst of all to me is the cavalier attitude and no accountability.

Tried calling the store this morning, and the call immediately was put on hold. Waiting to get to speak with a person (which never happened...I gave up), I had plenty of time to read reviews, so I know that my experience is not an isolated incident. How disappointing to buy a brand new home and have the experience marred by a completely lack of quality, concern and follow up. If you have a choice in who performs work in your home, I implore you to steer clear of Gene's Floor Covering II in Gulf Shores, AL!!

resp.text: Ms. Coaker, we do apologize for any confusion. Our internet and phone lines are down and we are working vigilantly to get this fixed. If you would please give us a call this afternoon with more information regarding your claim we would be happy to discuss your issues further.

We’re in 8 months now and back to square one except now our baseboards look horrible. I would never recommend this company because of their installers.

name: William Adcock
text:
Gene's was recommended to us by our rental management company for replacing the carpet in our condo with porcelain tile planks.  The lady at the store (Jennifer) that we dealt with was very helpful in picking out the flooring that would work best for our unit. We were very pleased with that part of the process, but installation was a different story.  We realize that with putting down tile, there will be some level of dust involved (with the amount of the dust that was still in the unit a week later, it looked like the tile was actually cut inside the unit – which they vehemently denied), and a good cleaning required once they’re finished.  The floor installer that they used on our unit made no attempt to cover any electronic equipment or furniture – there was so much dust in the unit that a week after the installation had been completed, and three full days after the deep clean company had been cleaning, it still looked like a construction zone.  There was so much dust floating around the unit that the A/C filter had to be changed out 3 times during the 2-week period following completion of the installation.  The quarter round that was installed (that we paid extra for) had gaps of several feet with no nail in it to secure it to the baseboard, as well as big cracks between the baseboard and quarter round – not a good look.
Since we live several hours away, and since our rental management company deals with floor installations on a fairly regular basis, we asked the mgmt company to discuss the issues with Gene’s, due to the additional cleaning (2 separate deep cleans) that were required, having to clean the coils on all the appliances, in addition to a few things that the installers broke that were in our unit. I also talked to Gene’s to see if they would help to pay for a portion of the additional costs that were incurred as a result of the “damage” that was done, but neither of us were successful.  I think the flooring looks good, but I was extremely disappointed in the dealings that we had with Gene’s Flooring after the initial selection of the flooring.
I would highly recommend finding a different flooring company, especially if you’re having ceramic or porcelain tile installed!

text: This company has good work ethics, did a high quality service. They are very experienced in installing carpet and laminate flooring. Would recommend them to anyone.Great job!!!

resp.text: Thanks Gina for sharing!

name: Erin Kraus
text: Terrible service.... highly unprofessional and very low quality

name: April Haines
text: The guys were really nice, professional and helpful. I couldn't be happier with the work and our new flooring!

resp.text: Thank you, April, for sharing your experience.  Enjoy the new flooring :)

name: Stephanie Weishaupt
text: Romanoff went out of their way to help us get our floor installed  after our first two batches of materials were defective. I can't say enough good things about them. We will definitely use them again.

name: Jonathan Wood
text: The staff was very professional and the installation was perfect. I have flooring experience and can say these folks know what they’re doing.

name: Carlos Quick
text: Even though I couldn’t personally be there when I got home I was completely satisfied thank you

resp.text: Thank you, Carlos, for sharing your experience.  Enjoy :)

name: Tim Thomasson
text: The installers did a great job.  We love our new flooring.

name: Crisse Bolton
text: Friendly, super helpful and very professional!  I would recommend Romanoff Renovations to anyone for carpet installation!

name: Oscar Fernandez
text: Lori is great to work with. Carpet install was great. They were on time and finished in a timely manner. Very professional. Would highly reccommed.

name: Don Hughes
text: On time and completed as promised

resp.text: Thank you, Don, for sharing your experience.  Enjoy!

name: Derek Herscovici
text:
The first thing that let me know I had picked the right general contractor was Jordan Latimer’s attention to detail. Other GC’s weren’t willing to take the extra measurements, or recommend quality parts, or go the extra mile to make sure this project was done right.
When the renovation process began, he communicated the process every step of the way. He let me know where there were issues and promptly set about fixing them with almost no time lost. He helped me achieve my vision for this bathroom and shower remodel and brought in a team of specialists and experts to see it through to completion. He does nothing halfway and values your input too, instead of overriding your ideas. I have gotten to know Jordan a lot during this process, and he is not only a fabulous contractor, but a man of great heart and compassion. He understands people as well as he does home remodeling and does not skimp on either. I cannot reccomend him enough. YOU WILL NEVER NEED ANOTHER CONTRACTOR AGAIN.

resp.text: Thank you Derek! That was very kind of you to say those words. I take a lot of pride in my work and I will never take a shortcut to jeopardize the integrity of a job. It has been wonderful getting to know you and I look forward to the continuing work we have going forward from here. Once again your kind words are very much appreciated.

name: Anthony Spina
text: Jordan is a top notch contractor. He went well out of his way to make sure all of our needs were taken care of. He even fixed things we never asked him to fix at no additional cost. Jordan is a perfectionist and pays attention to every detail of his work. I would highly recommend him.

resp.text: Anthony, thank you so much for the kind words! I really enjoyed working for your great family and if you ever need us we are always here for you. Thanks again!

name: Ben Burnett
text: Jordan and his crew did a magnificent job.  Jordan is a honest guy, and his attention to detail in his work is second to none.  I trust him and his craftsmanship.  I knew it from the first time he came to do an estimate.  I would not want anybody else to do my work.  Our kitchen that they did is really beyond words.

resp.text: Thank you so much Ben! We are so very thrilled to know that y’all are happy with the kitchen. Looking forward to the future jobs and will get you guys some adjusted numbers just as soon as we can.

name: Tracy Witte
text: Jordan does excellent work and really prides himself in getting a job done correctly. We have hired his company for several jobs over the past 4 years and have always been extremely pleased with his work.  Unlike many local contractors, who are hard to track down, Jordan communicates so well, which makes it easy to work with him. He is *so* responsive by phone, text, etc. We recommend him highly to all of our local friends and will hire him again in a heartbeat for any future repairs/remodeling.

resp.text: Tracy, we are so thrilled that you are happy with the outcome of your new front door. It goes so well with everything on the house and this whole project has been a major transformation. You guys are some of my favorite people to work for and thank you so much for the kind words!!

name: Steve Sforzini
text: Jordan recently did a countertop installation for us.  It was not a huge job but did require some creativity and ingenuity for this particular job.   Jordan came up with a way to do the job and communicated with us every step of the way.  I would describe Jordan as a very conscientious and dependable professional home remodeler.  We are ready for him to do our next job.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Sforzini! We really appreciate the kind words and we will get you an estimate for the next job as soon as we are able.

name: Belle Winful
text: I don' t even know where to begin with this review. I wish I could provide all pictures of our home before and after the complete renovation to see how amazing of a job that was done. JL Remodeling & Home Repair made our home more beautiful than we even envisioned. What I love most about Jordan, the owner, is that he will not improvise the integrity of work being performed by cutting corners. He Is extremely detailed and takes so much pride in his work! You will see it the moment you hire him. He is trustworthy, resourceful, and extremely professional. From how fair and detailed our estimates were in the beginning, to our home being left spotless at the very end; you can have confidence in all work that is done. This is so important because you do not want just anyone handling something as valuable as your home. We are very grateful for him and his company and we will use them for any future remodeling or home repair needs.

resp.text: Thank you Mrs. Winful. We really appreciate your kind words and enjoyed working with you guys so much during such an exciting time for your family.

name: Seth Donaldson
text: JL remodeling was a great group of guys to work with. The flooring was done quickly, it looks incredible, and Jordan was very open and easy to communicate with. If I ever need any other repairs done, this will be the first place I go.

name: S Gitter
text: We've had Jordan do several jobs for us. He has always done a great job. We are always more than satisfied with the work and service that he and his team provide.

resp.text: Thank you so much Mr. Gitter! It’s been a long time since we have heard from you so I hope you and the family are well! We sure have grown quite a bit since the last time we’ve done anything for you, but would be glad to help you on anything in the future no matter how big or small. Thanks again, as your review is much appreciated!

name: Emily Joyner
text: I highly recommend Jordan and his group. Every interaction I have had with him has been professional and he is always willing to go above and beyond to make sure I am happy with his work. I recommend him for any work you need done!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind words Emily! We look forward to working with you again in April!

name: Rena Cannon
text: Jordan prepares very detailed quotes in a very timely manner. Jordan replaced the mini gutters on my mobile home in Auburn. He did a fantastic job! He also replaced the master bath tub and surround. Again, he did an excellent job. I highly recommend Jordan and will continue to do business with him.

name: A Duke
text: Jordan did an exceptional job remodeling our kitchen. There was an extensive mold issue when we bought our house so he basically gutted the whole area and made sure the mold was completely out.  Overall, I am very impressed with his work and absolutely love our new kitchen!! Jordan was awesome to work with, paid attention to the details, and went above and beyond to make our vision come to life. I would highly recommend him to anyone who is doing a major renovation. He is excellent!

name: Will Miller
text: Jordan at JL Remodeling is the most honest and conscientious contractor we have ever worked with. He was thorough and always kept an open line of communication with us throughout the remodel. He does a very professional job and finished the project in a timely manner. We highly recommend Jordan and found that there's no job he can't do!

name: Margie Rush
text: "Thank you for helping us with our bathroom remodel. We are very pleased. Great work. Very dependable and professional. Detailed estimates and will use again if needed."

name: Colleen S.
text: Replaced an existing tub/shower with a shower.  Great job, impressive work ethic, excellent value.   Highly recommend  you give them a look.

name: Pat Margreiter
text: We have used JL Remodeling for 3 very different projects for our property in Auburn. All have been done professionally, on time and at a fair price. We highly recommend him and will most definitely use Jordan again.

resp.text: Mrs. Margreiter, you guys have been a pleasure to do business with and we will gladly take on anything you may have in the future. We’re always just a phone call away!

name: CHERYL HALE
text:
JL Remodeling did a wonderful job on our home in Auburn, AL.
The mold remediation and repair of the leaky ceiling has been a success for a year now. We hired them again this week to do more renovation projects around the home. Very knowledgeable, professional, efficient, timely proposal, reasonable pricing and attention to detail. I Highly recommend this company for all of your repair/renovate needs in Auburn area.

resp.text: Mrs. Hale, you’ve been a pleasure to work with and we will gladly take on any projects you ever have.

name: Carolyn Mitchell
text: I recently had my master bath remodeled, and the transformation is amazing.  Since I was at home during the work period, Mr. Latimer consulted me frequently about the details making sure everything was done to my satisfaction. I am very pleased with the workmanship and cost of the project -- Well Done!

name: Brenda Woods
text: Jo remodeling & home repair did an excellent job remodeling our kitchen and bathroom. We are very pleased with the results and would recommend them highly.

name: YellowPeep KingSheets
text: Actually not that bad for the price. Nice location and parking is always available. The appliances could use some updating but they still work despite age. Neighbors don't pry and tend to keep to themselves. You can have pets but its extra towards the rent, If I'm not mistaken $100 to $200 extra.

name: Robert Pastuszka
text: On the verge of ghetto

name: Jennifer Montgomery
text: Nice

name: Eddie Parker
text: We could not be happier with the work we had done by Juan and his crew. They showed up every day right on time and stayed as long as it took to complete the job. They take great pride in their work and will not quit until everything is done just right. We would defiantly use them again.

resp.text: Colossians 3:23 And whatsoever ye do, do it heartily, as to the Lord and not unto men.  Blessings my friends.

name: Erik Marsh
text: I wanted to let you know how pleased I am with the job well done at home. My bathroom looks astonishing. I really love what you did with the floor. I will certainly call you again to help me with my next project. Keep up the great work! Highly recommended!

resp.text: Thank you Erik. God Bless youns.

name: Pete Sutton
text: I turned to these people for the installation of the new tiles for my bathroom. They did an amazing job, and I am glad to have hired them. I would also like to recommend them to anyone who needs to turn to capable and reliable professionals. Thank you for everything, and keep it up!

resp.text: Thank you Pete. God Bless youns.

name: Jason Marshall
text: Juan and his crew installed flooring for us and did a great job!  Communication and services were excellent! I would definitely use them again.

name: Leo Adams
text: I hired these people for the installation of my new ceramic tiles, and I must say that they did a great job. I would gladly recommend them to anyone who wants to hire capable and experienced professionals. Thank you for everything, and keep it up!

name: Nicky Heinzen
text: Juan and his folks have done a wonderful job for me and I will continue to use them for my home and office. He saved my garage and even noticed mistakes that another contractor made that would have made the floor fall on my car. I can't thank him and his workers enough for the hard work and professionalism.

resp.text: Thank you Nicky. Blessings.

name: Howard Miller
text: They are a reliable tile contractor that did good work in our home. We highly recommend them.

resp.text: Thank you my friend. God Bless you.

name: Jonathan Camino
text: Very professional ceramic tile replacement service. Their work is great. Will call you again soon.

resp.text: Thanks and God Bless you my friend.

name: Harold Burkett
text: Super nice guys and they do great work. Installed tile in my kitchen and dining room. They were very informative and helpful. Great job guys and thanks.

name: Alabama Lucey
text: We have done business here before and once again the employees were OUTSTANDING!  They even took us in the back to show us their kitchen flooring so we could have a better feel for what it would look like   Another place you have got to at least check out if you're in the market for flooring.  But they have other items also like tile for backsplashes.

name: Jordan Smith
text: Blake was amazing! I wasn’t having much luck getting ANY responses (email, phone, etc) from other local flooring stores but Blake kept in touch and worked with us on getting us the BEST price and made the process SO easy!!!!! Will recommend to everyone I know, & be using them for all future needs!

name: Tracy Sedlack
text: Needed a quick install to sell a house. Customer service was outstanding. Jim worked with me and helped find me a great deal on new flooring. Installed two days later and looks great. Can't thank Jim and the installers enough for the great service and help picking a great looking carpet for the whole house.

name: Ashley Carson
text: Most definitely a one stop shop!!! I am so very happy we chose American Flooring, Cabinet, and Granite to take care of all our needs in building our new home. My husband an I finally built our dream house this year;  we were treated like family from all the staff and installers from start to finish.  We did LVP flooring throughout it is absolutely gorgeous. They helped us pick out the perfect tile and accent pieces for our walk-in shower. The solid wood cabinets were just fantastic they went perfect with the quartzite we chose for the kitchen an master bath, it makes my heart beat fast, it's so beautiful. They have a large selection from all over he world, slabs I have never seen before anywhere.                                        I want to thank everyone there for making our experience a little less painful, anytime you build a house things come up and we were very pleased how they worked with us on our scheduling.  I highly recommend American Flooring, Cabinet, and Granite to all my family and friends. We are so very happy!!!!

name: Melanie Lobel
text: First visit to American Carpet and had the best experience picking out carpet. Johnny Marino was such a professional and assisted me with making great selections at a terrific price. They were able to meet my installation requirements immediately. The quality and service was so remarkable that I went back 2 days later and purchased gorgeous marble for my fireplace surround. What a pleasure doing business with American Carpet and Flooring. Definitely ask for Johnny. Great guy.

name: Tazman Reid.
text:
The sales lady was fantastic, she pretty much took care of everything over the phone, I went to the store and was out of there in 10 min.
A 10 for Marisa !

name: Gerald Drakeford
text:
Mr. Don Williams always has a warm smile and greeting each time we visit the store. Johnny facilitated our flooring and granite orders and was great to work with as well!

We had hardwood floors as well as granite countertops installed.  Glynn and his crew did a great job on the flooring. They were on time each day and were very attentive to details during the installation.

Likewise, the guys that installed our granite countertops were top shelf as well, detail oriented, and very professional.

Would definitely recommend American Carpets and Flooring!

name: Kishina Brown
text: I was looking for purchasing new flooring for the rest of my house. I walked in with a large piece of carpet in hand to see what would look good with my new carpet. As I entered I was not greeted. I noticed three men in a corner talking and I walked close by and again never greeted. So I will not ever step foot in this store again.

name: James Sessions
text: My wife and I decided to totally remodel our master bathroom which was a big deal for us.  After making visits to several stores and getting conflicting advice on what we could and should not do. We were so confused but knew how we wanted the new bathroom to look.   I suggested that we stop by American Flooring which we decided to be the last stop before leaving Mobile and head to Baldwin County or even Pensacola. American Flooring should have been our first stop.  We met Johnny Marino and shared with him what we wanted to see in our new and updated bathroom project.  He took our the contractor's proposal along with many pictures that my wife had gotten off the internet, how we wanted our new bathroom to look.  He provided us with expert advice.  He took the time to tell us what we needed.  He was more than a salesman... I considered him an expert in flooring.  We are so excited, we cannot wait until the job is completed.

name: Burchfield lc
text: Great service from picking out flooring to the install! Highly recommend! They are a locally owned company with fantastic prices, I will be back next time!

name: Sandra Mikul
text: Beautiful installation! Michael and Cliff were pleasant, efficient and we love the final product.  Glad we decided on new counters! Also, Robert gave us good advice on choosing colors while we were looking at the large inventory.  Thanks

name: Daniel Garrido
text: Amazing store to buy from, great people and service. Definitely recommend!

name: Ashley La Bounty
text: Our experiences has been amazing!!! The quality flooring and staff is amazing. Had the pleasure of working with the owner himself and he make us feel right at home every time.

name: Quintin Wilder
text: I only deliver packages to them but every time I go they always helping someone with a great attitude.

name: Stanley Self
text: Great. Carpet and pad.  Wonderful flooring.   Installers were very friendly and respectful.  Salesman was very friendly and helpful.  Very satisfied.

name: Theresa Seibert
text: American Flooring and Granite has impeccable customer service very knowledgeable on all the products.  I love the fact that they use a 15 year sealer on all the natural stones. They have a large selection to choose from. My counter tops are beautiful!

name: Richard Moore
text:
NEVER AGAIN!
This level of incompetence is unfathomable. My installer calls me up to verify directions, ten minutes later one of the employees calls me to tell me "We can't sell you this flooring" ( That the salesman practically begged us to pay for weeks earlier) Half my house is on my porch and in my yard at this point. They had their third "problem" reported two days earlier but didn't bother to call the people who had bought any of it. The sales man was an absolute joke. I don't know whos brother-in-law he is but that is the ONLY way he could keep his job!
The Installers....were AWESOME! (Sub contracted).
This is only part of the issues I had....all I can say is,
American Flooring will NEVER get another dime from me.

name: Jesse Brewer
text: We did a major  2 1/2 bathroom remodel at our home and American Flooring Cabinets & Granite did a great job! It was a pleasure working with  Jennifer who helped us pick out our porcelain tile and exotic granite.  It did not stop there she took the time to pick out the paint color that would compliment the exotic granite and porcelain tile.  The  selection of porcelain tile and granite options we viewed that day at American Flooring Cabinets & Granite was  top quality.  The workers did a top notch job.  At the completion of the job, Jennifer came out and looked over everything and made sure we were satisfied with everything.  All of our questions were answered.  Our future flooring projects will definitely be handled through American Flooring.

resp.text: Thank you, Jesse! Glad we could serve you!

name: Donna Dicken
text: My husband and I are very please with the whole experience from buying our flooring to the two gentleman who put it in. They did a fantastic job. We LOVE our new floor. We recommend American Flooring, Cabinets & Granite and will use again in the future.

name: Steven Duquette
text: I had a great experience at AFC&G from the minute I walked through the door until the minute the job was completed.  Don and Jennifer were so helpful throughout the entire process and what a selection of materials they have in the storeroom to choose from.  My granite counter tops and custom designed shower turned out like a showroom display.  Many thanks to Roland who did the design and installation.  Every measurement and cut he made was with laser precision.  I highly recommend you visit the showroom to see what they carry and talk with their very knowledgeable sales reps.

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Duquette! We loved the finished product and are glad to have you as a loyal customer! If you need anything at all, you know who to call.

name: jay trammell
text: Stay away from this place. Salesman that helped me was great. Owner is crazy to work with I was giving quote and come in to store and he changed it. Very low to do. Obviously does not care about business . This 5k plus Job was going to be a 12k plus job when done so business is not his priority. Other stores did honor their quotes.  Check your options as they lost me and a lot more business because of this guy. Pathetic customer relations .

name: Forest Dixon`
text: American Flooring, Cabinets & Granite is the best place to go if you're interested in perusing some remodeling a home. We just had some new carpet installed in our house and couldn't be more pleased with the outcome! Mr. Don Williams is personable, yet professional. He gave us a fair up-front price as soon as we gave him our measurements. Ms. Jessica also helped us and she was a pleasure to work with as well. Even the installers were professional, quick and did a wonderful job. We are planning on remodeling our bathrooms with new cabinets, granite counter-tops and porcelain tile, so we know exactly where to go for our next project!

resp.text: Thank you, Forest! We appreciate your business!

name: Maggie Ainsworth
text: American Carpet did an AMAZING job on my new vinyl flooring!!! Workers were professional, punctual, and friendly. I would highly recommend them to anyone interested in new floors. Will definitely use them again!!!!

name: Mike Doggett
text: Great Selection!! This store has a TON of products. Jennifer was our salesperson and guided us every step of the way. We looked at engineered wood and solid wood flooring, but ended up getting a beautiful tile that looks exactly like a wood floor. Guests are shocked when they find out it's tile. We also got a backsplash and granite for our bar and it looks amazing. We will be going back when we get ready for cabinets.  I would recommend this company to anyone looking upgrade their home. They had a amazing selection of vinyl plank and vinyl tile that would be perfect for a bigger family on a budget.

resp.text: Thank you, Mike! Great doing business with you!

name: HM M
text: I walked in and was not greeted. I walked up to two people at desks and they didn't seem interested and couldn't seem to help even though I had a tile in my hand. They called another guy. I asked him about finding a similar size to my vintage tile because Lowe's only had 4x4. He said it would have to be measured and hesitated. He said he would see if he could find a tape measure. He came back and measured and said 4.25x4.25 and that was custom. He said I would have to buy a box but wasn't positive he knew how many tiles that was. He did a bunch of stuff on a calculator until he quoted me 100 tiles for $62. I needed 14 so I told him I would check back after searching. He told me he had the same problem when he did his bathroom. He said okay and maybe I would find an open box somewhere. I walked into Home Depot and 4.25x4.25 is a standard size. I bought 14 tiles for $2.46. I'm not sure what to say about that. I will let you come up with your own conclusions.

name: Lynn Sigouin
text:
Thank you once again for another beautiful and professional installation. Our stairs look like the center piece of our new home thanks to our wonderful Irene who gave us great customer service and always followed up with calls, Jonathon and Stephen who installed with perfection for detail and so,so polite and so talented.
And for the kind, sweet voice on the other end greeting me this morning,  Jessica who assisted all my needs.
Great team you have, Don...Jay, I am sorry to have missed you my friend but we couldn't be more pleased .
Blessings to all,
Thank you again,
Ray and Lynn Sigouin (Principe)

resp.text: Thank you so much, Lynn!! We are so thankful for your business. Please let us know if you need anything else in the future!

name: Belinda Hall
text: I came to this store for cabinets.  It is going on 2 months. The are not hung. The parts of the cabinets they just ordered without ever coming to my home for any type of measurements are under my carport blocking so I can't park my car. I have called repeatedly,  people have been rude, hung up on, talked down, and still no progress!!

name: Nina Propst
text: We are very satisfied with our new carpet and with the service we received.  We recommend checking them out for all of your flooring and countertops first...it will save you lots of time and stress!  Special thanks to Don Williams.  We will be back.

name: Mendy Nilsson
text: Shannon Williams is fantastic. He listened to my needs and showed me lots of options giving the pros and cons of each type of floor. That allowed me to choose the best floor for my needs and WOW I'm so thrilled with my luxury vinyl plank flooring. So beautiful and so easy to clean it makes cleaning house fun. Thank you Shannon and American!!

name: LeBarbara Stinson
text: I had the opportunity to have my Luxury Vinyl Plank floors installed by Mr. Glenn Smith. He had his team members with him. They were the kindest men. They worked hard and didn't half step on anything! They are funny and welcoming. I would recommend them anytime. I thoroughly enjoyed them. They were professional and operated on total and complete excellence!

resp.text: Thank you, LeBarbara!! We will let Glenn know he did a great job. We appreciate your business!

name: Susan Allen
text:
Very informative, professional, and helpful!

Thanks Don Williams.

name: Lisa McGhee
text: I want to say that I won a contest with American Carpets. My prize was 250$ off any area rug in the show room. I went in yesterday to pick out my rug, and was greeted by the owner Mr. Don.. I never expected to have the experience I had with the owner and or any of the showroom employee's they were all so nice and helpful. The owner was there to help me the whole time and made it very memorable he is a very great guy.. I would never hesitate about sending someone in to get any flooring these people treated me with the up most respect and dignity as if I was a paying customer and I'll never forget that... Thanks again to all the people at American Carpets.. y'all are the best... Thanks again Mr. Don glad to have met you...

resp.text: Thank you, Lisa! It was our pleasure!

name: Mr. Curtis
text:
In the past I've remodeled homes for a living, but was never in the position to actually come out of pocket and select carpets, etc.
It turns out making the right choice is lots harder than you think! With the fierce competition now days, it's easy to be told what you want to hear, given prices that you can't judge properly, and ultimately, run around in circles ending with products that are NOT to your satisfaction.
These issues do not arise with American Flooring (the Mobile location is the one I've become acquainted with). The woman who answered my calls, Jessica, was absolutely wonderful to speak with, and the sales person she brought me to the table with, Shane, was both professional, and compassionate.
Suffice it to say I will be returning very soon!

resp.text: Thanks you, Mr. Curtis!! We look forward to hearing from you soon, and in the meantime if you have any questions at all, you know who to call!

name: t h
text: I have recently completed a kitchen renovation and love the outcome. Don helped me select the perfect quartzite countertop for the new island, we purchased luxury vinyl plank for the new floors plus found a beautiful new rug too. Thank you so much for all of your assistance! I am pleased and feel I got a great deal and great service at American Flooring. I would highly recommend them to all of my family and friends.

resp.text: Thank you!! We loved the way your kitchen turned out. Looking forward to doing business with you again in the future!

name: candes ritter
text: I’ve had several rooms carpeted and have always received excellent service, prices and installments.  Absolutely...... this is your first stop if you need flooring!

resp.text: Thank you, Candes! We really appreciate your business!

name: Gary Stiegler
text: My wife came in with a sample and the info for the flooring which had been purchased at AC.  Johnny,  the salesman immediately let her know without looking around that they didn't carry the item.  She proceeded to look around the store on her own, no one asking if she needed help, but after 20 minutes, found the exact piece of flooring!  Found Johnny, and he gave her a price of almost $200 for a 12 piece box of vinyl flooring.  Thanks, but NO THANKS American Carpets!

name: Sally Faucheaux
text: Thank you Jennifer ..... She  was my floor and cabinet specialist..... And thank you for all your expertise,   Also want to thank every one else at  American flooring this is not  the. first time that they have done work for me.  I was very pleased in the past,   It has been some years ago I am changing now because I don't want carpet anymore I want to change to ceramic....great job then, and I am sure they will do a awesome job this time as well, after all   I came back for more ;)

name: Rachel Jenkins
text: Jennifer Vaughan is amazing to work with.   She saw my vision and brought it to life.  She also prepared me for the installation experience by explaining it honestly and in depth.   I will never use anyone else in the future except her.   American Flooring needs to hold on to her.

name: Sharon Thompson
text: I am a mortgage lender in the Mobile and Baldwin county areas and have referred more clients than I can count to the Mobile and Gulf Shores locations over the years. Whatever your home needs may be, American Flooring is well rounded with an amazing selection of products, and a wonderful team of sales reps and installers. Be sure you follow them on Facebook, they do lots of giveaways and sales you don't want to miss! If you want to call before you go in and actually schedule ahead, ask for Jessica and she'll make sure someone is there to greet you and meet whatever needs you have!

name: Jessica Bates
text: I'm only giving one star because the material itself was great. The guy that did our template for our countertops measured wrong and only half of my notch was able to be done. The installers flooded my bathroom because the water wasn't off when they took the pipes apart. They knocked several holes in my walls and left without mentioning any of them. After a SIX HOUR install, I still had no water to my sinks and only half of the kitchen done. My stuff wet and laying everywhere and holes in walls in every room they worked in.

resp.text:
Thank you for taking the time to let us know about the situation. We are reaching out to the installation crew and will make this right for you, whatever it may take. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

Update: Thank you for allowing us to fix all of the issues. We appreciate your business!!

name: Leslile Reddick
text: I used American Carpets to install my granite, carpet and laminate flooring in my kitchen.  This was done in August 2013.  My carpet separated between rooms and along the kitchen and living room and nails are sticking up.  My under counter sink is loose.  I have been trying to have this fixed for months now with no resolution at all.  Chris in installation has been out to my house twice to "look" at it with promises of it being fixed.  Nothing has been done.  I feel that the work that was done was unprofessional and cheap.  I spent a lot of money on this and would expect it to last longer than a year and if not, at least for it to be fixed in a timely manner.  I will never refer anybody to American Carpets as my experience has been very dissatisfying.  I have never written a review before, much less a negative one, but I felt I had to because I have been getting the run around for months.

name: Steve Baker
text: Very friendly folks. Not only did I get a great job on my ceramic flooring​, I think that this business has a lot of Christian people and that is why it is doing so good. Chris and his son that laid my flooring did a great job. Shane the salesman also knows his job. A plus to this business.

name: Lacy Hilliard
text: Craig Crawford and his crew did excellent on the installation of vinyl flooring. They were personable, well mannered and addressed my concerns immediately . This is the crew you need for your installation! Showroom time was quick and precise with my needs.

resp.text: Thank you, Lacy! We've let Craig know how great of a job he did. We look forward to doing business with you in the future!

name: Kem Hall
text: I googled wood floorings and came up with this store. For years I thought they only sold carpet.  I found a vast amount of everything needed for a home; granite, cabinets, wood flooring, tile, rugs, vinyl plank, you name it and its here.  This is a ONE STOP SHOP. Employees are welcoming, helpful and knowledgeable to help with everything. They have good deals too.

name: Kyla Gaston
text: I GOT THE OPPORTUNITY TO WORK WITH JENNIFER V. AND JAN R.  - OH MY GOODNESS THEY ARE A TERRIFIC TEAM. I HAD AN ISSUE WITH MY FLOOR WHEN MY HOME WAS BUILT DUE TO THE WRONG DOOR BEING PLACED IN THE HOME, MY WOOD FLOORING HAD TO COME UP DUE TO WATER DAMAGE AND I HAD TO REPLACE IT WITH ANOTHER PRODUCT. JENNIFER AND JAN SAW HOW UPSET I WAS AND WAS ABLE TO MAKE FEEL BETTER AND REASSURED ME THE SECTION OF MY FLOOR WOULD LOOK FABULOUS. I AM SO HAPPY WITH THE TILE AND MOSIAC ACCENT TILE FOR THE FLOOR AREA, IT LOOKS LIKE THE HOME WAS ORGINALLY BUILT THAT WAY. I CAN NOT SAY ENOUGH FOR JENNIFER AND JAN TWO WONDERFUL LADIES AND THEY ARE GREAT AT THEIR JOBS.

resp.text: Thank you for your business, Kyla!!

name: Ethel Moore
text: My husband and I received a warm welcome upon entering the storefront and we were treated wonderfully! I explained to Shannon,  our sales rep,  what I wanted and he took us right to it!  It felt as if we were old friends.  I was never pressured to purchase anything which is a PLUS.  I cannot count the many times that I left a place due to the pressure to buy something that I'm really not looking for.  We also met the 'big man in charge' -as I affectionately refer to him.  You know,  the 'open 8 to 8 so don't be late' gentleman.  Lol.  Very warm and professional.  The carpet they installed looks AMAZING!  It's exactly what I wanted at the price I wanted! I will DEFINITELY recommend American Flooring and Cabinets. Ask for Shannon,  HE IS A GEM!

name: Lynn Zimmerman
text: We had Johnny also five years ago and are sorry we went there. We asked for the best pad that they had and also wanted quality carpet and were told that we had ordered it. Now we have "humps" in our carpet from stretching and we have to replace it soon. They tiled our foyer, hall and kitchen and while we love the tile they are uneven and chipped. Afterwards they fixed some but in order to make it right they would have had to redo most of it.  For $6,000+ we just expected better.  Make sure that you know what you are getting is right and the quality that you expect. We went to the Mobile store to have our work done.

name: AllDone3
text:
Not only did they sell me on buying material from them instead of the competitors in the are, they educated me on WHY was more durable or waterproof than another and explained the difference in the products that I was interested in.

"People buy from people, not companies."

These people took fantastic care of me and my home.

resp.text: Thank you, Aldon! We look forward to doing more business with you in the future!

name: Katie Azevedo
text: We love our new carpet! The prices were reasonable and everything was done quickly and professionally.

name: Mallory Howard
text: So, my impression was great when I left the store but quickly changed. Salesmen were very helpful. Acted eager to help us get our remodel done. They showed me a countertop that they had in stock. It was ok, but not exactly when I was looking for but they insisted it looked great. I again, said no, I’ll keep looking. Kept looking and found the one, the countertop that would look the best. Left the store with the salesman’s card to call back with measurements. My husband called them 2 hours later to get a quote. Salesman tried selling him the countertop they had in stock but was not what I looking for. My husband told him no, she wants the other. He quoted him a price. Then called back and DOUBLED the the first quote because they’d have to order it. Seems they were eager to help sell what they had in stock, but be darned to sell what they’d have to order. We won’t be making a purchase from this store. Our business will go else where.

name: Scotti Bee
text: Great place. Everyone I worked with was fantastic. Great attitudes, wonderful customer service.

name: Apple Henderson
text: Well..well well, what can I say??  I sought help and met a man named Johnny at American.  We were needing granite and flooring.  He showed us a couple of choices and suggested we go to the warehouse in Loxley to pick granite and took our info and said  let him know what we decide on and we'll get a quote.  Needless to say he lost our info and forgot who we were.  We contacted him and reminded him of the quote.  He was to get with us on several occasions and did not!!  The lady who answered my call was aware of my frustration and got a owner/manager to take my call.  Got another we'll get you the answer and call you spill again.  We are not from here and should have believed reviews...SOOOO grateful to have been referred to HARD ROCK GRANITE....they are professional, personable,  thorough, quick and they treat you like family. If quality everything choose HARD ROCK they will be honest and get you a better deal too!!!!!

resp.text:
April,

I am so sorry to hear about your unfortunate experience. We really appreciate your feedback, and hope that in the future you give us the chance to make it right.

name: Logan Crouch
text:
I came in with a friend and Johnny Marino was our salesmen. I have never had a worse experience. He was introduced to us as 'the man who knew it best' and that he had 'been in the business for 43 years'. However, he was not polite, seemed to talk over us as we explained our needs, treated us as if we had no idea what we wanted, and overall was completely unprofessional: not only to us, but for other customers who were in the store. We were shown one product, and after the purchase, were shown a completely different colored product; then were argued to repeatedly that it was the light causing the color difference.

The business had a wide selection of products, and I'm sure with another salesman we would have had a better experience. But this particular transaction just left a bad taste in my mouth.

name: Joshua Carper
text: Dont shop here they are crooks!

name: Victoria Wilson
text: Advertised "Open 8 to 8". Arrived about 5:40 unaware of new store hours. Came to buy flooring for 3 rooms. Salesman took me to the back to look at sheet vinyl rolls and remnants. Told me to browse while he figured out how much I needed from the measurements that I provided. I thought he was taking a little too long. Went to look for him and discovered that everyone had left and locked the doors. That's when I saw a sheet of white paper on the front door with new store hours 8-6. I HAD A PANIC ATTACK! Called my sister. She called Mobile Police Dept. MPD came. A woman in another vehicle then arrived and told him how to get me out. I left a note on the salesman's desk with my name and phone number and what had happened. I picked up my floor plan and measurements and left. NO ONE EVEN CALLED TO APOLOGIZE.

name: Michael A
text: Service was excellent. Shane Gros was very helpful. Definitely the place to shop. Can't go wrong. Thank you Shane for all your help!

After we shopped around at several stores we found this place the most useful because of their helpful staff, affordable prices and financing. We ended up buying 1500 sq ft of carpet and had it installed last week, my wife loves the carpet and I love being able to get out of bed barefoot. We are very happy with American Flooring and would recommend them to anyone who needs a good deal on carpet

text: I love, love, love my new kitchen granite countertops. They look great with the new cabinets recently installed by American Flooring, Cabinets , and Granite . Next is the bathroom shower and countertops and a bedroom needs hardwood flooring and........American Flooring, Cabinets, & Granite "Your One Stop Shop" for all of your remodeling needs!

I was told by a young lady there the drawings wouldn't be until late that evening and that I had to buy something to get a ticket. I then decided to buy a bottle of cleaner and was told that wasn't enough value for a ticket into the drawing. Clearly a bait and switch tactic to get people in their expensive store. Buyers Beware!

resp.text: No purchase was necessary to enter the contest or win. In fact, 4 out of 5 of our big prize winners didn't shop with us that day. We did not find this customer in our database of transactions that day. We appreciate all of our customers who came in for our 45th anniversary customer appreciation day event and hope to continue being your one stop shop!

We got everything we asked for .the company is number 5 you

Robert and Norma BEACHMAN

name: val hansen
text: When you place an order for 14 boxes for laminate flooring and get 3 boxes you think maybe it was just 1 mistake.  When you also place an order for ceramic tile for the facing of your fireplace at the same time you ordered the laminate flooring and you get 3/4 of it you start to wonder about this store that's been in business for so long. When you place an order for 3 boxes of ceramic tile for the inside of your fireplace at that very same time and you get 1 box because they FORGOT to order 3 and  you have PAID for it ALL!!!!  I am wondering WTH is THEIR problem!!!!  I took back the 1 box of ceramic tile since I didn't like it,  it didn't match, got a refund, pkd up the 3 boxes of flooring and tried to give me the other 2 boxes of ceramic tile I had gotten a refund on?????  Yes, I know had for me to believe too!!  Finally got all of my flooring. Had to reorder more fireplace facing tiles, pd for it, was told it was ordered as I was in the store and would be in that Friday, it came in the next Tuesday!!!! Found out it was NOT ordered until the day AFTER I ordered it!!!!  BTW, I finally went to LOWES, and got the rest of the ceramic tile I needed for the inside of my fireplace that they had IN STOCK!!  All this going on as my contractor was doing what he could with what we had!!!  Needless to say HE was not very happy and will be writing a review also on this store.  I live 18 miles 1 way from this Mobile store.  I made a trip 6 days in a row.  My sales person was Shane Williams.  I would NEVER recommend this store to anyone and will tell everyone I know of my experience.

text: Misleading sales. If they make a mistake you are stuck with it...no returns! I tell everyone not to shop here. Salesman called me "sweetie" when he refused to correct his mistake..how demeaning. Similar incident with an acquaintance of mine, so must not be a rare occurrence.

name: Ashlyn Jones
text: Really wish I could give 0/5 stars because that's exactly what you will get working with Issis and Sons Flooring. During our previous home renovation, everything this company touched had to be fixed twice. Bathroom tile was laid un-level and a cracked piece was installed. Not to mention, the guy used so much self leveler it leaked through into our basement! A complete mess! 1500 SQ FT of LVP had to be removed and reinstalled due to no prep work involved and cracked pieces installed. Most quarter round was cracked and not even stained on the ends. Not to mention, they could not even provide ONE piece of missing quarter round that was requested for two weeks. POOR QUALITY AND CRAFTSMANSHIP. Stairs were stained twice and still had paint brush bristle hairs in the stain. Called it quits with these guys and will find someone to finish the job they already started. BEWARE...it's not worth your time or money.

name: daniel weber
text:
The guy I spoke with had a terrible attitude.
I called there today and asked them to send one of their estimators over to do measurements and give me a bid on replacing carpet.

After I told him that I would like to have the opportunity to introduce myself our company and products to them as well, he was very rude and said that he didn't need my business, then hung up the phone.
I believe in doing business with organizations that want to do business with you and keeping money local.
Apparently this gentleman has all the business he needs and doesn't care about local businesses.
DONT WASTE YOUR TIME HERE, WHEN THERE ARE MANY OTHER (LOCAL) FLOORING COMPANIES THAT WOULD LOVE TO WORK WITH YOU AND EARN YOUR BUSINESS.

text: The guys at the ware house work hard to help you out . Good service the only thing I don't like about it is they need to have more tools for tile installers.

text: After 3 months of getting the run around from two very non-professional flooring companies and walking over torn up wood, Issis and Sons stepped in to save the day! Not only were they quick to respond and sent a wonderful crew, they came when they said they would. We could not be more pleased with our beautiful flooring! We would recommend them above all others! Thank you Issis and Sons!

name: botcwc1
text: Put 4 inch hardwoods in our master suite and closet. Excellent job. When I was putting furniture back I accidentally scratch the floor and Jimmy immediately send somebody out to fix it at no charge. Top-notch service. Thanks again :-)

text: I bought 3 rugs from Issis for my new house to put on my refinished hardwood  floors,   The rugs are beautiful and Issis came and installed them.  I later learned that the pads they had put underneath them were cheap and could deteriorate .  My the time I found out and replaced them my new hardwood floors already had spots where the pad had stuck to the floor and left a sticky residue.  You would think after buying expensive rugs that Issis would put better pads under them or at least tell you that you needed to buy pads.  The fact that they put pad under them that could ruin my floors is appalling .

resp.text: Sue, our apology for the slow response. I took over for the role of communication manager recently and would like to know what we can do to make you happy. Please email me at issis.furniture1@gmail.com or contact your sales representative directly. Thank you

Keller Interiors kept me informed and gave me an accurate 3 hour window for install.

Randy was FANTASTIC. He gave me an update call 20 minutes before arriving. Was on time and VERY professional. Completed the job quickly and with great craftsmanship.

10/10 would recommend using Keller to anyone.

name: Chris Jewett
text: Keller Interiors did a great job on our new carpet install. Eric and his crew knew we had a delay in our carpet, so they came late in the afternoon the day before our scheduled install and almost finished the job, needing only a little bit of time the following morning. They were courteous and efficient, but also did a fantastic job with the install. Highly recommend Eric and his crew at Keller Interiors if you can get them!

name: Jakobi Knox-McQuart
text: Randy did a excellent job on installing the carpet in my room. I am very pleased with Keller Interiors and especially Randy for giving me a great experience! I definitely look forward to installing more new carpets in my home.

name: Tony Piacente
text: Randy is an excellent installer and person. We have met him previously on another job Keller performed for us. We were hoping the installer  was the same person. Luckily for us it was.

name: Cari Presley
text: I am very pleased with my new carpet. Ryan did an excellent job and was very quick and professional. He even left me his cell number if I had any issues since I wasn't installing the baseboards until a later time. I hope Keller appreciates and rewards his great work!

name: Amy LeBon
text:
I recently purchased new carpet and laminate from Lowe’s and Keller Interiors was contracted to install both. The carpet was installed as scheduled and went according to plan. Unfortunately, the laminate install was not as seamless. When Steven and his crew started laying the flooring Steven noticed that the laminate was milled wrong at the factory and was slightly bowed. Steven stopped the install immediately and showed my husband his concern. He advised that he could finish the install but it probably wouldn’t last a year due to pressure points. Our other option was to have the flooring returned and try again. We chose the latter as we were putting our rental on the market and wanted the job done right. I was so thankful that Steven was open and honest. We weren’t just another work order and he wanted the job done right. He knew this was a rental and that before the problems arose the house would no longer be our problem. He could have kept quiet, installed the flooring and moved on but he didn’t.

I also want to add that I was coordinating all of this from California and Keller was great at communicating. Joe and Tracy new my case and made it easy to schedule from afar.

I highly recommend Keller Interiors. I have already recommended them to my realtor in the Madison County area to use with future clients. I wish them all the best and hope that they stay true to their roots with their honesty and integrity.

name: MyLifeAsMycah
text: We are so pleased with our carpet installation!! The installers were very professional and completed the install in a few hours!! Thank you Keller Interiors and Eric and his install crew! We really appreciate your service!!

text: The installer was great! Very professional. The adjuster measured for too much carpet and no matter how I tried to tell him and Lowe's I was ignored. Lowes ended up eating the extra caroet cost. The installer even said the adjuster accounted for too much carpet. The installer should be in the decision about how much flooring is needed for a certain job. The adjuster and the office people are the reason for the 4 stars. I'm not an idiot and did not like being treated like one.

name: P Sill

text: Great people! Came in and were very fair on pricing. name: Bill Martin
text: I think next time I will go with a vendor who guarantees their work for more than just a year. We hired Daddy Daughter to remove wrinkles in our carpet. There were several rooms and we had furniture in the room they said they could work around. The carpet looked good initially; however, within two years the wrinkles were back  and are now worse than ever. Since their guarantee is for 1 year they would not return to correct the problem. I wasted $1,500.

resp.text:
I am so sorry that you are disappointed. You reached out to me recently about this and I responded to you immediately. And then we continued to email back and forth several times and I also called you and left a message but never got a call back. Although you did not have your receipt I found my copy and we did this job closer to 3 years ago and it is clearly written on the receipt that the work is guaranteed for one year. I offered to come look at it and possibly do some more work at a much discounted rate but told you that I would not be able to offer more than a one year guarantee. In all our years of business you are the first customer  to ever call us back about returning wrinkles. I was probably more disappointed than you are. But I remember you live by a lake and moisture and other factors can come into play with carpet.  That is why I tell people I guarantee my work for one year but I don't anticipate you ever having any more problems. I'm so sorry this happened to you and again this is the first customer we've ever had to call us back about this. If you want to reach out to me again I would be willing to come back for just a service call fee and see if I can at least restretch the worst areas that are most bothersome to you.
Charity Woods with Daddy Daughter Carpet
